website_summaries.verdict: If money is no object, this is a superior golf shoe that is particularly praised for its support and comfort while walking.
pros: Offers a lot of shot support
cons: Some reports of the cushioning being too thin, so you can feel the spikes through the padding

customer_reviews.title: G. O. A. T.
customer_reviews.text: It's too bad that Ecco stopped making this model golf shoe. It is the most comfortable and supportive golf shoe that I have ever used. I was lucky enough to find several pairs in my size after they went out of production.
customer_reviews.author: Muddbone

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit as size advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about the sizes for this ECCO fitting large. I wear a sz 11. I ordered a sz 10 - 10.5 because some reviews said the shoes fit large. When I received my 10 - 10.5 shoes, Sure enough, the shoes were 10.5 and too small. I exchanged the shoes for a 11 - 11.5. The shoes fit dead on sz 11!! These are the best golf shoes I have ever owned. Yes. they are pricey, but in golf shoes, you get what you pay for. Would and will buy them again, but in my size 11 from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: WarBucks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Relatively Comfortable, A Bit Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and relatively comfortable. After all day on the links the small toe on my left foot (I'm right handed) just begin to get sore. I suspect it's due to my windup when swinging. They are well made, I like the styling, but the price is a bit high when compared to others. I think I prefer my Foot Joys' better, even if I've never had a pair that were built as durable as these ECCO's.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. L.

customer_reviews.title: What comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 pairs of Ecco shoes. Once I determined that my "typical" shoe size was 11.5 (or 45) but that in Eccos the best fit is 10.5 (or 44), I have had nothing but great satisfaction. These golf shoes are super lightweight and the laces draw support around your entire foot for an exceptionally comfortable experience. My last pair of Ecco golf shoes lasted three years, despite walking around 50 rounds per year. Once you get your size right, you can't go wrong buying Eccos online.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: The Best Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for 3 years and they are without a doubt my best golf shoes. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Wallop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! That's what I can say.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was very confused what to get either with spike or spikeless. After thorough reviews, this one wins over every shoes I wore before. Even with spikes, it's like walking on the heaven! I played two rounds of golf, and not even feeling tired. Now I know why everyone's been craving for Ecco shoes. I usually wear size 9 (Nike), but the size 42 EU fits perfect. What I can say is that I will be purchasing only Ecco shoes from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Young K.

customer_reviews.title: Like a great glove from the start
customer_reviews.text: These were the most comfortable golf shoes I ever bought. I ususally buy the tennis shoe style golf shoe but decided to go with leather this time. These felt so good from the start. I played a round of golf three days in a row wearing these shoes straight from the box with only great things to say about their comfort and shot support. The lifetime guarantee from Ecco is a big plus also.
customer_reviews.author: Kaimuki

customer_reviews.title: Try on before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes as a gift, and was ecstatic since ecco is known for having the most comfortable golf shoes around. However, they fit at least 1 size too large. I typically wear a 9.5 (US) shoe size, and even the 8-8.5 shoes are a little too big for me for this particular model. they are only offered in full size increments which makes it more difficult to find the perfect fit. And at $200+ I would like a little better fit. Otherwise, the quality and comfort are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and stable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of golf shoes to replace my old Ecco golf shoes that I used for 9 years. This pair is much lighter, fits very well on my feet and keep them very stable through my swing. I like to walk the course whenever possible. This is a great walking shoe as well. I'm a big fan of Ecco shoes. They are well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Efty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love to walk the course whenever possible and these shoes make the difference from enjoying my or round or not! Golf has too many other distractions than to have to worry about your feet hurting! These shoes are perfect! I have worn Ecco brand shoes in every other style from flip flops to dress shoes and all of them are lightweight and very comfortable! It was a great decision to buy these shoes! Keep up the good work Ecco!
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoes I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing for about 10 years and these are the most comfortable, best looking shoes I've owned. I think most of the benefit comes if you walk a lot. If you're going to take a cart, walk 5 steps and hit the ball, then I'm not sure you can justify the price, but the comfort level increase for a walker is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I own. They did fall apart after three seasons (100 plus rounds) Not sure any other shoe can claim that.
customer_reviews.author: David W1

customer_reviews.title: ECCO makes great golf shoes - but
customer_reviews.text: I have always like ECCO shoes - and their golf shoes are not a disappointment for comfort. If I had it to do over - I would make sure that I buy the higher size range. I wear a 10.5 most of the time, so I bought the 10-10.5 - and these are a little snug, so a 10.5/11 if they have it would fit better. Also - they do absorb water more than golf shoes should. They dry quickly - but aren't as waterproof as Footjoys.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: ECCO is the BEST golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son is an avid golfer and wore out his last pair of ECCO shoes. We ordered the new BIOM G2 shoes, but they were more narrow. I learned from ECCO that the sole/base shape of the G2 is the same as the BIOM hybrid, and they just added spikes. The BIOM golf lace is the newer version of this shoe. ECCO is the BEST golf shoe. My son and husband have tried other top brands, and they regret it every time. This makes the 7th pair, between the 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendee Carr

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried these shoes on in Dicks before I purchased them online. Glad I did because they run large. I normally wear a 9 wide but chose the 8-8 1/2 because the 9-9 1/2 were a size too large. I've worn them twice and are snug but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: THE most comfortable golf shoe I have ever bought. I have Plantar Fasciitis in my left foot and these shoes allow me to walk 18 holes of golf pain free. That alone makes them worth every penny. I would also add nice looking and excellent grip to the review.
customer_reviews.author: RobinGolf

customer_reviews.title: Ecco is as expected - excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I usually would never shop for shoes online because of size differences but Ecco, 44 is the same size shoe to the next so if you've had one, successive ones will fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: E. Guss

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, super light, good structure.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable golf shoe I have ever worn. They provide solid structure and support but are lighter than a feather. The sizing method they use seems to work perfectly for my feet...they don't come in 8, 8.5, 9, etc....they come in 8-8.5, 9-9.5.
customer_reviews.author: eddierey

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Been eying these for some time and when my Nike's started leaking, decided to purchase these. I'm a size 10 and they were 10-10.5 and they are slightly large. Walked 18 holes in wet conditions and the shoes were very comfortable. In addition, the foot support was superb. Hoping these last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Among the most comfortable golf shoes I have every owned.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. Light weight. Good support. Well made and last forever. I have had them for several years and they are like new.
customer_reviews.author: TonySueB

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: IF you can afford it--buy it!! You will NOT find a better fitting shoe. I can walk comfortably --never a shoe problem
customer_reviews.author: limper55

customer_reviews.title: ECCO Mens Biom Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. They feel great and don't need breaking in. I have an earlier Ecco hydromax model now into their 4th season, I am playing more golf than ever don't use a cart and they are still in great order. I bought these as a replacement pair when I thought the Amazon deal was too good to refuse so they will be in the closet for a while. An old friend of my father has a menswear shop and his motto (I think it is borrowed) is" no one ever regretted buying quality". That definitely applies here
customer_reviews.author: Brad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a golf shoe that works.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have tried many other brands of golf shoes and these are the first to fit like a glove and provide the lateral support I need. Great walking shoe on the course too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Giroux

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of ECCO golf shoes, but this ones where on a great price and I personally loved the box that they bring, they are amazing, comfortable shoes and I really recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez/Guatemala

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves all styles of Ecco golf shoes. I read a review saying that Ecco doesn't make replacement spikes for this shoe which is true, but beside the point. These are generic spikes, you can buy a key and replacement spikes in any decent golf store.
customer_reviews.author: Katybelle

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I used to only wear FootJoy, and I still like that brand very much. But this is my second pair of BIOM Hydromax shoes and I wish I could afford to buy 20 pairs and never have to worry about shoes for the rest of my life. Pricey, but DEFINITELY worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit and Great Grip
customer_reviews.text: This shoe meets my expectations for both comfort and grip on the course. The sole is firm where you need it and flexible at the same time. I imagine going through many sets of spikes before changing to another shoe!
customer_reviews.author: LA DIY

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ecco BIOM golf shoes...sad to say I wore the old pair out after a couple hundred rounds... Although expensive, they are worth every penny! I walk most rounds and my feet have never been sore or blistered, unlike many of the other name brands I have sadly owned. Until Ecco goes out of business or stops manufacturing golf shoes, they have one customer for life. Highly recommend to the avid golfer!
customer_reviews.author: John Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is usually between a 10.5-11 so having to choose the sizes 10-10.5 or 11-11.5 I went with the bigger n they ended up being too big for him. He was very excited n really liked the way they felt. Definitely will b ordering another pair. Just if u have to choose in between sizes like 10.5-11 and they offer 10-10.5 or 11-11.5 go with the smaller
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I've ever owned - if they didn't have cleats, I'd wear them on the street - expensive? Yes but I'd pay the price again in a minute
customer_reviews.author: mapa

customer_reviews.title: Comfort doesn't justify high cost
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were comfortable but not significantly better than much lower cost options. I bought these shoes because of my prior experience with their street shoes but was disappointed with their golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Oblio

customer_reviews.title: golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, if you don't need the strret bottoms, my husband loves these-says very comfortable, it was a gift from me
customer_reviews.author: kimu

customer_reviews.title: WHY DID THEY DO IT?
customer_reviews.text: COMFORTABLE SHOE BUT YOU GO TO PUTT AND THE SUN SHINES OFF THE SILVER BAND AT THE BOTTOM OF THE LACES? WHAT GENIUS CAME UP WITH THAT IDEA?
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT S.

customer_reviews.title: shoe care
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have purchased the only problem there is no instructions for proper care as far as protecting the leather or how to clean it properly other than that you never know you are wearing them-GREAT GOLF SHOE
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Very comfortable and water resistent. I play golf in rain everyday and these shoes are great. I can play with these shoes all year round
customer_reviews.author: David Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, But Need Wide Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very comfortable if you don't have wide feet, nice styling, and good traction. Cons: No wide sizes, heavier than Adizero, and price is a little steep.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable Golf shoes on the market. A little pricey, but if you play a lot of golf and walk these are worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Junkie

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: High quality, water proof, extremely comfortable and good looking. lots of arch support and they do not slip, really grips the ground. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W.Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Ecco Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don't like being asked to write so many words in order to rate a product- I liked them I don't like the request to say so many things- if requested to do this again I will not be buying any more products from you!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these golf shoes and the quality is great
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: not so waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great right out of the box. That said, I used them for the second time today in constant rain. It seems the only waterproof portion of the shoe is the tongue. The water came through to my socks on the rest of the upper. I expected better from ecco.
customer_reviews.author: AZCat2001

customer_reviews.title: Great@!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality products. Very comfortable to wear. Highly recommend to friends to wear this type of shoe... Perfect soft fit....
customer_reviews.author: Cigar

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These ECCO golf shoes held up to the ECCO Brand and expected quality. I played 72 holes in two days and did not break in the shoes prior to wearing them on the course and did not have any issues with them. Ecco superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Weber

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: i have a 2 yr old pair in white, the most comfortable golf shoes i have ever worn. like them so much i ordered the black pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely the finest, most comfortable golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: the shoes fit like a perfect pair of gloves. end of the day your feet are ready for more golf, not less. although pricey, the value is there. highly engineered, incredible shoes.
customer_reviews.author: steven w luquire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really is a comfortable golf shoe. I wish everyone could experience what it feels like to wear ECCO.
customer_reviews.author: howard tate

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I wore this shoe, I felt so comfortable and secure. It is hard to explain how awesome it feels. You just got to try this shoe. Your golf score will be at least 5 stroke better with this shoes. I am playing so much better with this shoes at least 5 stroke each time when I play. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Ecco Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I own the ECCO mens golf streets and decided to add the Hydromax to the collection. Comfortable the first time in them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jarmon

customer_reviews.title: one of the best
customer_reviews.text: this shoes is extremely comfortable and stable. I have a problem with my feet and very picky for shoes and this is amazing one. I have experience with FJ, Nike and adidas and pretty sure that ECCO is the best. I don't know what is the tech but strings are very tight and keep it very stable. not so sure about how to clean this Yak, only one drawback here. and, delivery was very slow.
customer_reviews.author: Donghui

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: great fit, lightweight, good walking shoe, only complaint is cost but will buy another pair, better product than previous models,
customer_reviews.author: Brad Morris

customer_reviews.title: Ecco latest
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light and comfortable They give a excellent foundation during the swing with absolutely no stopping whatsoever thanks Jackson
customer_reviews.author: jackson prentice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I have ever owned, can play 36 and feet not hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: ECCO Men's BIOM Hydromax Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, they fit well, look good with great support. This is a very good golf show, and the price was better then the ECCO shore.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: 5-12 the shoes feel great but I had to use a thin sock I ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought the 11.5-12 the shoes feel great but I had to use a thin sock I wear 11.5 in the regular Ecco shoes
customer_reviews.author: JimTechxas

customer_reviews.title: Not as sure-fire as my non-golf Eccos
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable to put my foot in, and I've worn them a couple of rounds with just a hint of blisters coming on both heels. They are the same size as two other pairs of non-golf Ecco shoes that I have, and I've loved the others. I'm sure these will be wonderful next summer when I get a few more rounds in them; they just weren't quite like the duck-to-water that I've come to expect from Ecco and that other reviews suggested.
customer_reviews.author: matcon08

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not much arch support, not very supportive or cushioned. I do like Ecco casual shoes but these miss the mark
customer_reviews.author: kazzy23

customer_reviews.title: Ecco Mens Biom Hydromax
customer_reviews.text: Since I play in the Northwest area of the USA, this is the best shoe in relationship to comfort, dryness in rainy season playing and function in wet surface. I will continue to purchase them as long as ECCO keeps making them! (Handicap 14, frequency of play over 80 rounds per year.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Already the feet do not get tired me when I travel 18 holes of the field. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Arraiz

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very nice shoe, love the design and look - the spikes are excellent. The size runs a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T Hardy

customer_reviews.title: So. Good.
customer_reviews.text: So. Good. But White Color is not special for me. Next time, I wanna buy another color same ECCO brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kwangil Park

customer_reviews.title: ecco biom golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit very comfortable I walked 18 holes right out of the box didn't have any problems with the break in period like other shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky K. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Shoes too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like the Ecco shoes but they are not wide enough. Apparently Ecco does not offer wide sizes. I sent the shoes back.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf shoe I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, balance and good looking to boot! The shoe feels of great build and quality. Can't wait to use them this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Lim

customer_reviews.title: ... walk all the time and these shoes are the best
customer_reviews.text: I walk all the time and these shoes are the best ever
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried many makers.. No one compete Ecco for me. I always wear Ecco last 5 years. Because so comfotable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Atsushi Ito

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would wear them all the time if they were not golf shoes. These are great and I wish I had bought them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of golf shoes I have ever put on. I would rate these right up there with the Icons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Bf loved his new golf shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my boyfriend these pair of shoes for Christmas and he absolutely loves them! He already played 18 holes with them and he did they super comfortable the whole time. He wants them in the white and silver now. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Raisa Krause

customer_reviews.title: High-quality leather and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous golf shoes, I bougt for my husband. High-quality leather and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: your missing out on amazing comfort. You can take these shoes right out ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have not had the chance to try out ECCO golf shoes... your missing out on amazing comfort.You can take these shoes right out of the box, put them on, and go play golf all day. I have just bought my second pair of the BIOM Hydromax. When I put the new shoes on, I can't tell the difference from my old shoes. Until I found ECCO golf shoes, I hated wearing golf shoes. I could never find a pair with the kind of comfort and support I need to golf all day. ECCO... I don't know how you do it, but thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Hess

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are sooo comfortable. I can't wait to take a trip south ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sooo comfortable. I can't wait to take a trip south where I can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Collier

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's BIOM Hydromax Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
Whoever said that golf was a good walk spoiled never played 18 in the BIOM Hydromax golf shoe from ECCO. Built to enhance your natural gait, this lightweight shoe superior shock absorption plus a better ground feel for a one, two punch that brings out the best in your game. Plus, the leather upper is treated with Hydromax water repellant to add a layer of protection for those first-thing-in-the-morning rounds.

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: Leather golf cleat featuring logoed laces, lightly padded collar, and flexible forefoot
